entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near the Rockies this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 20 April 2023
